org.opendaylight.controller.samples.loadbalancer.entities

Class VIP

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.opendaylight.controller.samples.loadbalancer.entities.VIP

  • public class VIP
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents the Virtual IP (VIP) address exposed by the load balancer application. Load balancer service differentiates one VIP from the other, using the following three properties: 1. IP address of the VIP exposed by the application 2. Protocol of the network traffic (TCP/UDP) 3. Port to which incoming traffic is destined User is allowed to create mutliple VIPs with the same IP, but all such VIPs (with the same IP) should differ at least in the protocol or port or both. NOTE: Each VIP should have a unique name.
